trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_SEQ_00<tab>Alphinaud has a mind to join the others at the High Crucible.
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Alisaie.
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Alisaie again.
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Alisaie.
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Krile at the Baldesion Annex.
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Ojika Tsunjika.
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_ALISAIE_000_000<tab>Like his sister Tiamat, Vrtra is possessed of a gentle soul. I'm glad they're on our side.
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_ALPHINAUD_000_010<tab>The attendant was kind enough to give me directions to the High Crucible. First, let us return to the mulberry orchard.

TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_ALPHINAUD_000_020<tab>I understand the mulberries are for the silkworms. Grown a stone's throw away from the satrap's residence... It gives it the quintessential Thavnairian flair, don't you think?
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_ALISAIE_000_030<tab>From here, we're supposed to follow the path left and past the mulberries...
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_ALPHINAUD_000_040<tab>The word Yuj apparently means “bind” in the local tongue, and this district is so named because it connects all others in the city.
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_ALPHINAUD_000_041<tab>If we manage to come this far, we shouldn't have trouble finding the High Crucible─or so I was told.
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_ALISAIE_000_050<tab>Where the street turns, enter the door straight ahead then descend the steps...

TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_ALISAIE_000_051<tab>I thought the Crystarium was confusing, but it doesn't compare to Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han. The architecture and decorations make it even harder to get your bearings.
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_ALISAIE_000_052<tab>Anyway, let's see where this door takes us.
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_ALISAIE_000_060<tab>Whew, it seems we're on the right track.
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_ALPHINAUD_000_070<tab>And here is the aetheryte plaza. So far so good, and there isn't much further to go.
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_ALPHINAUD_000_071<tab>From here, we just need to cross to the other side of the hall, then pass through the larger of two doorways. The High Crucible lies beyond.
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_ALPHINAUD_000_072<tab>I suspect the others have already collected the warding scales. Come, let us join them.
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_THANCRED_000_080<tab>You took your time. Got turned around, I take it?
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_URIANGER_000_085<tab>Though this land hath been afforded a respite, in turmoil do many others languish still. Our work is far from finished.
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_ALPHINAUD_000_090<tab>What an immense laboratory... How many such places were enlisted to help forge the warding scales, I wonder.
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_YSHTOLA_000_095<tab>Excellent. You're in time to hear the latest good news.
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_KRILE_000_100<tab>The Students have previously turned to Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han's alchemists for help with the analysis of various artifacts.
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_KRILE_000_101<tab>That is how I became acquainted with Nidhana. I'm glad we could rescue her, and pray she makes a full recovery...
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_GRAHATIA_000_105<tab>I'm quite well now, I assure you. As they say, the stronger the taste─and stranger the color─the more effective the remedy.
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_GRAHATIA_000_106<tab>With my body trying to replenish the aether I spent, however, I'm feeling rather famished...
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_GRAHATIA_000_107<tab>I think a sampling of the local delicacies is in order. Hamsa cuisine would be a good place to start, perhaps?
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_ESTINIEN_000_110<tab>As I heard it, after you defeated Nidhogg, his scales found their way into the hands of the Firmament's artisans.
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_ESTINIEN_000_111<tab>Steeped in power as they are, it's no surprise that they were coveted. Still, it is a strange legacy for the vengeful wyrm.
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_ALISAIE_000_120<tab>We're last, of course, but at least we found the place.
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_NIDHANA_000_130<tab>The last thing I remember before being absorbed into the tower was you rushing towards me...
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_NIDHANA_000_131<tab>I can only imagine the hardships you and yours must have had to overcome to rescue us.
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_NIDHANA_000_132<tab>No amount of words will suffice to express my gratitude, but I hope the flower's radiant glow says everything I cannot.
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_OJIKATSUNJIKA_000_135<tab>Ah, you are returned!
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_KRILE_000_140<tab>It's good to be back, and with the fruit of our labors safely in storage!
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_KRILE_000_141<tab>For now, we have but to wait for the others to return from their respective meetings with the Alliance leaders.
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_KRILE_000_142<tab>As Thancred suggested, you should get some rest in the meantime!
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_KRILE_000_150<tab>Your chamber is comfortable, I hope? If it's cold in there, just let me know─we have plenty of blankets to spare.

TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_OJIKATSUNJIKA_000_160<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Krile has apprised me of your recent accomplishments. What an amazing feat to eliminate a tower, and pave the way to deal with the rest.

TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_OJIKATSUNJIKA_000_161<tab>While it isn't much, I've changed your sheets and plumped up your pillow. After all, there's nothing like collapsing in a nice clean bed after completing a major malmstone, be it penning a thesis or defeating deiform entities!
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_OJIKATSUNJIKA_000_162<tab>So, would you like to take a look at your new and improved lodgings now?
TEXT_AKTKMA123_04379_Q1_000_163<tab>Retire to your chamber?
